title: Taric lost his identity, removed kayle uniqueness, and just like Bard - solo Q useless, LCS broken?
body:
1. {{champion:10}} is boring as it is, the last few nerfs almost killed her hybrid build (in season 2 she could go adc and do really well). she was the only champion who could do what {{champion:44}} does.  Riot loves to give new champions old abilities only empowered. 2.5 seconds cast time will be a problem in Solo Q (what's that?), but in a skype team this ultimate will be abused vs a non super heavy cc teams.

2. it's like {{champion:202}} and {{champion:51}}, now im not saying someone is op or broken, but this recycle of abilities needs to stop at some point. 

3. {{champion:44}} was all about countering heavy AD teams, infact people started taking {{champion:23}} because he was so damn weak. now after the rework, at the current rate {{champion:23}} will be nerfed as a support which will hurt his top lane.

love the rework, but what was the point?, {{champion:44}} is either a huge miss or a toxic champion (worse than {{champion:432}} )
